Parameters.Name: WebsiteName
Parameters.Label: Website name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the site in IIS

Parameters.Name: WebSiteCheckDelay
Parameters.Label: Status check interval
Parameters.HelpText: The delay, in milliseconds, between each attempt to query the website to see if its status is "Stopped"

Parameters.Name: WebSiteCheckRetries
Parameters.Label: Status check retries
Parameters.HelpText: The number of retries before an error is thrown.
